category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html:
Studioart, specialist in the production of highly textured leather wall coverings and leathers for
upholstery for interior decoration, represents the cutting edge of the creative flair in leather that
has made the Dalle Mese family stand out in the international industrial tanning district for over 50
years. The extensive craftsmanship experience fused together with creativity, the ongoing
technological innovation, the foresight and commitment to a pioneering spirit have been the key
success factors of the long family business. Founded in 2006, Studioart has a thoroughly made in
Italy production, where leather goes beyond the frontiers of the fashion world to become the
protagonist of interior design with unique furnishing solutions. All Studioart leathers derive from
premium European raw materials, which are tanned and processed with a thoroughly Made in Italy
production in respect of the environment.
